snippet.title: John Vervaeke & Jordan Hall: Explorations in Meaning
snippet.description:
A unique conversation between two of the most pioneering thinkers we've featured on the channel.

John Vervaeke is a professor of psychology at Toronto University and creator of the cult hit YouTube series 'Awakening from the Meaning Crisis'. Jordan Hall (formerly Greenhall) is a futurist and culture hacker.

In this very meta conversation, they examine the meaning crisis, the nature of sensemaking and what they find compelling about each other's thought.

Relevant links:

John Vervaeke, Jordan Peterson & the Meaning Crisis: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=n6RFSgjnqAQ&t=1527s

John Vervaeke, Flow States and Wisdom: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5jS2AiQEz-E&t=1337s

Reality Check 2019, Jordan Greenhall: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nLFFNpTQla0&t=1390s

If you enjoyed this - we have an amazing two and a half hour emergent conversation 'Making Sense of Sensemaking', between Jordan Hall, Jamie Wheal and Daniel Schmachtenberger - available for subscribers in the members area of our website: https://www.rebelwisdom.co.uk/plans
